title: Large 3BR/2BTH in Desirable Rogers Park Location!
map_address: W. Sherwin Ave near N. Sheridan Road
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Spacious 3-bedroom 2-bathroom 1700 sq. ft. apartment in a well-maintained building. The apartment features separate large dining room, updated kitchen, hardwood floors throughout, lots of natural light, and an attractive sun porch. The building is in East Rogers Park and is 1.5 blocks from the lake, close to parks, beaches, coffee, restaurants, markets and steps to the Jarvis Redline stop. Onsite laundry is in the building.  Rent is $2100 per month and includes heat and water.   Call Chad Johnson at 312-898-5288.  NO SMOKING NO PETS
